homeHeader.title: Launch, Network, and Thrive in Expo City Dubai Free Zone—Set Up & Scale with Our All-in-One Business Solutions
homeHeader.description: Position your business at the junction of four strategic highways to access lucrative regional and international markets. Scale stress-free by taking advantage of ECD Free Zone's smart infrastructure, state-of-the-art innovation hubs, and flexible multi-year licenses. Partner with our seasoned business consultants to expedite licensing and start growing from day one!

leftSection_5.title: Simplify Business Setup in Expo City Dubai in 5 Easy Steps

items.title: Pick Your Business Activity
items.description: We'll take the time to discuss your business needs to match you with the best-fit business activity and legal structure.

items.title: Submit Your Documents
items.description: Next, we'll help you compile the necessary documents and submit them to Expo City Dubai's licensing authority.

items.title: Pay & Secure Approvals
items.description: Once the DET approves your application, we'll pay the licensing fees on your behalf and obtain initial approvals.

items.title: Sign the Final Lease
items.description: The final step is to sign a lease agreement in person or remotely to obtain your trade license within 5-7 business days.

items.title: Get Post-Licensing Support
items.description: Beyond licensing, our PRO specialists offer personalised guidance for setting up your Free Zone bank account.

faq.title: Clear Answers, Expert Insights, Hassle Free Consulting Experience

items.question: What is Expo City Dubai Free Zone?
items.answer: Expo City Dubai Free Zone is a relatively new Free Zone located where Expo 2020 took place. The FZ boasts world-class infrastructure designed to promote sustainability and cut down the city's carbon footprint.

items.question: Can I relocate my spouse and children to the UAE with an ECD Free Zone license?
items.answer: Yes, Expo City Dubai Free Zone allows business owners, entrepreneurs, and innovators to sponsor their loved ones.

items.question: What documents do I need to launch my business in Expo City Dubai FZ?
items.answer: You’ll need a business plan, passport copies, and an MoA, depending on your selected business activity and legal structure.

items.question: Can I host events at Expo City Dubai Free Zone?
items.answer: Yes, Expo City Dubai offers businesses prime locations to host corporate events, including conferences, seminars, and product launches.

items.question: Does One Nexuz offer bank account opening guidance in Expo City Dubai?
items.answer: Yes, our skilled PRO agents offer end-to-end support to help you create a personal or corporate Free Zone bank account in ECD.
